body.name: beeprt Bluetooth Shipping Label Printer - Wireless Thermal Label Printer for Shipping Package Small Business, 4x6 Label Printer Compatible with Shopify Ebey Amazon Etsy FedEx UPS USPS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 12 mins
features: 【Print Wirelessly】BEEPRT Desktop Label Printer Support Printing Wirelessly. For IOS/Android, You Need to Download the App 'Shpping Printer Pro' from Google Play or Apple Store . For Windows 8 or Later, You Can Print Via Bluetooth. Windows, Mac, and Chromebook support USB connection. Chromebook users can directly print by adding the extension "Shipping Printer". (Note: Mac and Chromebook do not support Bluetooth printing.)

【Works with any Direct Thermal Label】 Wireless Label Printer is Not Finicky with the Brand of Labels to Saves Hundreds of Dollars on Label Costs. The Supported Label Width is from 1.57" to 4.3" Width and No Height Limited. You Can Use it As Barcode Label Printer, Postage Label Printer, Package Label Printer, Product Label Printer, Name Printer Label Machine, Sticker Label Printer, UPC Label Printer, SKU Label Printer, etc.

【Supports Major Platforms】Bluetooth Label Printer Works with Most Platforms Including USPS, UPS, eBay, Esty, Shopify, Amazon, PayPal, Poshmark, Square, Big commerce, Mercari, etc. Ideal for Your Small Business Shipping Packages.(Note: Please remember to download the label to be printed on the corresponding platform before printing, then upload it to the editor APP "Shipping Printer Pro" for printing).

【High-Speed & Clear Printing】Beeprt Mini Thermal Label Printer Achieves High-Speed Printing of 72 PCS/min Second While Sustaining 203DPI Quality. It Prints 4x6, 4x4, 4x2, 4x1, 3x2, 2.25x1.25, 2x1 Labels and More. Hence, You can Save time, Energy, and Content Visible for Scan and Read. Greatly Improve Your Working Efficiency

【Environment-Friendly】The Small Label Printing Machine is Lightweight, Doesn't Take Up Huge Space, and Carries Easily. Its Advanced Thermal Technology Prints Labels Without Toner and Ink to Reduce Pollution.（Note: The password for the printer is 0000

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: With its outstanding performance, this label printer surpasses my expectations in every way. When it comes to printing shipping labels, it excels by swiftly producing high-quality labels with exceptional clarity. Additionally, it comes bundled with a deck of adhesive label stickers, providing great convenience.One of the printer's standout features is its integration with a dedicated app. This allows for effortless label release directly from my smartphone, eliminating the need for manual operations and streamlining the entire labeling process. It simplifies and expedites tasks, enabling you to focus on other aspects of my business.Having relied on this machine extensively for my small business, I can confidently vouch for its flawless reliability. It has consistently performed without any hiccups, ensuring smooth label printing operations. If you're a small business owner, I 100% recommend investing in this label printer. It will undoubtedly enhance your efficiency and productivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy set up and printing well
reviews.reviewText: This is a small thermal label printing machines with different easy connection ways . You can set up that either on the phone with their app or connect to the computer with the cable comes in the package . It’s working well for the small business to printing the labels of ups , usps , FedEx and DHL . The shipping printer app is very easy to help size the label well and printing very fast . I try to use the machine to printing labels for two days and all the labels I printed from this machine work well to the carriers . It comes with some 4*6" labels . I will not worry about the machine out of ink any more . The labels are cheap and easy to get anywhere .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DONT BUY! Doesn’t attach to my Mac.
reviews.reviewText: I tried to attach the printer to my Mac, but it gives a very complicated software, and when I download the software that is needed it downloads it in the wrong format, and when I convert it, it still doesn’t work. Will be returning the printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Professional Labeling Made Easy with Label Printer
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Label Printer and I am beyond impressed with its performance! This little device is a game changer for organizing my home and office. The setup was incredibly easy and the printing is fast and efficient. The labels come out crisp and clear, and the variety of fonts and symbols available make it easy to create professional-looking labels for any purpose. I love how portable it is, making it easy to take with me on the go. Overall, I highly recommend the Label Printer to anyone in need of a reliable and efficient labeling solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is thermal. Because there isn't any ink, the ink doesn't dry out！
reviews.reviewText: I should have purchased this sooner. My inkjet printer has primarily been used for shipping labels. Getting a separate printer for shipping labels is highly advised because the ink can dry out so easily! I only needed a few minutes to set up the machine. Within minutes, I had it set up and was prepared to test it. Loading was very simple. Certainly not as difficult to use as an inkjet printer. I then installed it on my computer and tested it out. Oh, my! So easy. So easy. And a lot more effective. And now for the added bonus. This is thermal. Because there isn't any ink, the ink doesn't dry out even if I don't use it for a few weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The printer is very easy to use, printing labels is no problem at all, the machine is not expensive, and does not need to add ink, saves a lot of consumables, and the printing speed is also very fast. Hundreds of sheets will be ready in a while, faster than what I used before More, the handwriting is also very clear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wish this thing didn’t cost me nearly $100, it works as intended, but still, it’s just a thermal printer. Sometimes I have to reprint because the words don’t get printed completely, there’s sometimes white spots where the printer didn’t print. But overall it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality label printer with blue tooth and auto calibration
reviews.reviewText: I bought this label printer for my business. This printer size is small good for saving space. You can use mobile app to print through blue tooth which is super convenient. The printer quality is also very good. To prevent label not fully print out. It has auto calibration function. Overall it is a very good product. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.5/5 ⭐️'s Great Bluetooth shipping printer at a great price ✅
reviews.reviewText: 🔎 Overview 🔍The biggest gripe of a my small business is creating shipping labels and attaching them to the shipping package. Having a thermal printer not only saves me time but it also saves money as it is essential to helping me get parcels out efficiently. This bluetooth thermal printer is fantastic for the price. It prints accurately and quickly all while using no ink at all. It seamlessly connects to my Mac, PC, and to my iPhone via bluetooth. My favourite way of using the printer is by saving a label as an image, sending it to the shipping printer app, and scaling the label to fix a 4X6 label. My dislike of the product is the apps themselves as they are not the most intuitive and it takes a bit of fiddling to understand the capabilities of the software. I think a bit more improvement needs to be done on the software side of the apps but the hardware is perfect.✅ Pros ✅- Well designed machine- Inkless printing- Fast printing for multiple labels at a time- Wireless connectivity to help save time from using the computer❌ Cons ❌- The softwares require a bit of attention. Especially the app itself. It is a bit clunky and requires a bit of a learning curve to understand how to scale and print on it. The UI needs a major overhaul.📝 Overall 📝Overall I think this printer deserves a 4.5/5 stars. I've had the opportunity to try out many wired versions of these thermal printers and by far this one was been the most efficient thanks to the wireless connectivity. I would happily recommend this to small business owners who are looking for a price conscious thermal printer that works well!

This label printer is compact when used as a desktop device. I found it worked ok using my smartphone and bluetooth, but much better when used with my laptop in terms of typing out label text.For my smartphone I used their "Shipping Printer Pro" version of the app that allows you to type in text for printing the label. At the time of review, the features for font size and type were very limited but functional. It is probably best to use labels (files) that are already prepared with the smartphone.I was very satisfied with this printer's performance when I used it with my laptop, after downloading, scanning and installing their driver. I used word, chose the 4x6 size and was able to print out exactly what I wanted.The printing is practically silent and quick. The labels are easy to peel off and have a good adhesive.This labeller is great for printing address labels but also, in my case, for labelling boxes and containers. The labels stick well to metal and plastics, as well as, paper and cardboard.Handy to have and easier to use than full sized printers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Horrible, don’t waste your time or money
reviews.reviewText: At-a-glance (full review below):PROS:- Bluetooth connection was simpleCONS:- MacOS driver does not work at all- Mobile printing application barely works- Poor design compared to other options (large, bad hinge design)- Poor and incorrect instructions- Missing the USB drive with the driver and samples- No Bluetooth security (anyone could connect)—— Full Review ——I’ve used another thermal printer before, but was hoping that this one would make it easier for me to print thanks to the Bluetooth connectivity. Unfortunately, this printer is anything but easy.Out of the box, I was a bit surprised by how big the printer is. It’s larger and boxier than the other one I used before. Apart from that, the other included items (USB cable, USB A to C adapter, 4x6” labels) look quite standard and okay quality. Unfortunately, the product I received did not include the USB drive which is supposed to contain the drivers and some sample documents you can use to test the printer. The hinge on the printer is also not great, and it opens by “leaning back”. This means that loading labels is cumbersome compared to printers where they hinge to the left or right. The label guides do an okay job of aligning the labels, but its still difficult to get them to be straight (this is the same as with the other printer I’ve used, so this is about what I was expecting).Thankfully, the driver is available on the support site for this printer, but it there is a lot of different models so it took me a minute to find the right one. After that, the installation was straight-forward (if you’ve ever installed MacOS software before, it’s nothing special), and I went to add the printer. I was able to see the printer in the list of available options, and selected the correct driver as instructed. However, the paper instruction manual included does not match what is on the website, nor what you actually have to do, and the website instructions are poorly edited to show the proper steps. Clearly, there is very little QA here.I fought the printer for while, but no matter what I did or how I tried to configure it, it refused to print anything from my laptop. The error message “No printer available” was always displayed, leading me to believe that the driver does not actually work, or the USB interface on this printer is defective. Given the similarity to the other printer I’ve used, I tried using that driver as a last-ditch attempt, and still no luck.Just to try to get something to print, I downloaded the Bluetooth printing app to my phone. I was able to connect quickly to the printer, but I’m a bit disappointed that there’s no security on the connection. By that I mean, there was no PIN that I had to enter and no switch to toggle the Bluetooth on and off, so anyone nearby could’ve connected if they wanted to. This is disappointing in 2022.Once connected, I was able to load a PDF in the app and print it. Sadly, the app is not very intuitive and it took me multiple attempts to get it to print on a 2.25”x1.25” label properly (the size that is provided in the app is 1.25”x2.25” and did not auto-rotate, despite my attempts. I had to manually set it as a 2.25”x1.25” size, though specified in millimeters). Once I finally got this working, the alignment still looked off (it pushes right up to the edge of the label and does not fill it, and the two alignment modes made no visible difference), but I did see that there is an offset option that can be configured buried in the advanced options.Given that I need to be able to print from MacOS, I didn’t even bother attempting to set this printer up on my Windows PC. Perhaps it will work better on that platform, but given my experience so far I wouldn’t hold my breath.Overall, this printer was a waste of my time and I’m going to go back to what I was using before. The poor instructions, non-working MacOS driver, and mediocre-at-best mobile app make this printer a horrible choice, no matter what you pay for it. I would strongly suggest you look around for other options, as there are many in this market segment which actually do what they’re supposed to with less hassle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Le Bluetooth se connecte facilement et l'impression à partir du téléphone est vraiment fluide.
reviews.reviewText: Je viens de commencer une petite entreprise et je me suis procuré cette beeprt Imprimante d'étiquettes d'expédition Bluetooth pour mes expéditions. Elle est parfaite et répond à mon besoin.J'aime beaucoup ce nouveau modèle, car il est Bluetooth et je peux faire des impressions sans fin à partir de mon téléphone. Le Bluetooth se connecte facilement et l'impression à partir du téléphone est vraiment fluide. Le processus d'impression est assez simple, juste comme une imprimante ordinaire.Son application est facile à configurer et elle s'utilise facilement, très userfriendly.Cette imprimante est compacte est très bien faite avec du matériel haut de gamme. Elle vient avec un guide d'utilisation bien détaillé qui permet de la configurer sans aucun problème.Elle prend en charge plusieurs tailles de papier ce qui me donne plus d'options. L'impression est très lisible, pas comme les autres impressions de reçu qui sont à peine visibles.Son prix est abordable surtout avec le coupon comme au moment de la rédaction de ce commentaire.Elle vient avec des échantillons d'étiquette ce qui permet de l'utiliser directement à la réception.Je recommande cette imprimante pour son rapport qualité-prix.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.5 to 5 STARS. An all around decent unit that works.
reviews.reviewText: Current price point at the time/date of this review: $149.99 with a $20 off coupon currently being provided by the seller at this time. Yup, pricing is well on point with the market going rate. Works fine on my end.I own several of these types of units and this one comes in a decent, however not the smallest form factor. It’s an all around decent product in terms of design, build, and thermal printing quality. Keep it on the watchlist.
